article_title: Bolivia’s President Morales Fires Defense Minister After Aid Gaffe
article_text:
Bolivia’s President Evo Morales fired his defense minister after the official turned over a gift of drinking water for flood-stricken victims in northern Chile while wearing a vest that bore the slogan “The Ocean is Bolivia’s.”

Land-locked Bolivia claims part of Chile’s land and Pacific Ocean territory lost after a 19th-century war, a demand that Chile rejects.

Chile’s reaction to the message embroidered on the vest was swift....
